storyInfo: In modern-day Sargon, Sesa and Heavyrain are cautiously waiting for the mysterious 'Sand Soldier,' who suddenly asked to join Rhodes Island, to reveal his true identity, and it seems Kal'tsit has much to do with his past.

attributes.content: Modern Day
3:32 P.M. \ Clear
Central Sargon, Ibut Region, Nameless Town
You want to come with...?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You should know that you are just another suspicious character to us.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Have you inspected your teammates yet?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Heavyrain?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Everything's normal there...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: But I don't trust you.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Yes, very well said. Of course I am not to be trusted.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: What exactly is your objective?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: My objective... is to find out what my objective actually is.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: What the actualâ€”
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Did you know that the last Lord Ameer of Ibut died in a fire?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: That was a few years ago... The current Lord Ameer is his son, and that whole thing caused quite a ruckus in Ibut.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: I had to find myself a new fairy godmother right away thanks to that fire. Took me months to get used to the work there. Huge pain in the butt.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Right, exactly. He was my very last prey.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I did all the preparations and laid out my trap, but there's no more prey to hunt. I have nothing to do except to lounge around.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: â€”Y-You killed a Lord Ameer?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: The Sargon army will find youâ€”
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: â€”Wait, hold on, what do you even want, telling us about this?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Ah, I shouldn't have expected any less from one who frequents the black markets. That's right, there is no one who knows I have to do with his death aside from you and me.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: As for the Sargon army... We live in different times now. The ruling Padishahs simply care not about what is happening here in this barren wasteland.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: My guess is that it matters not to them whether it's the father or the son that's in charge. Actually, to tell the truth, it hardly matters to me either.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I sought his death and nothing else. It was a rather simple request.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: What are you after anyway?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Revenge.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I'm afraid it's a rather boring answer, so I don't like to share it. If I have to venture a guess, more than half of the men in this world would like to take revenge against something, be it their enemies, a city, or even the world itself.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: For the past twenty years, that is all I have been doing.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: My power, my status, my riches... All of them come second, and should the need arise, I will cast them all aside.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Or perhaps I could give them to this 'Rhodes Island.'
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: It's quite the bargain, wouldn't you agree?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Hoh, looks like you are still not convinced, young lady. You are quite cautious. I suppose you were a soldier? From Sargon, perhaps?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: â€”None of your business.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: What about you, young 'Bridge?' Or should I call you by the name you go by now, 'Sesa?'
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Sesa, we can't trust him.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You're hiding something pretty important, aren't you now?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Oh... Yes. Right, how forgetful of me...
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: You claim to be a medical corporation that treats the Infected... Very well, it's a fairly tall tale, but I will accept it for the moment.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I am an Infected.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: My fortunes are no less impressive than the Lord Ameers' riches, and I am well-connected and hold some sway, enough for me to bring a Lord Ameer to his downfall.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I will trade all of it for a chance to be cured. What do you say?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: â€”You're mad.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I find myself thinking the same quite often.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: But there is not a single person who walks these lands and wishes not to live. Is it not reasonable of me to want to cast all this aside just for a chance to be cured?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Nah, I don't think that's what Heavyrain's trying to say.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: You don't even seem to care that you're Infected...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: What is it that you want at Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Very well. There isn't much time left, so let us stop beating around the bush.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I'm looking for 'Kal'tsit.'
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Perhaps she will impart on me some invaluable advice, perhaps she will show me a new way forward... Yet it's even more likely that she won't lift a finger, merely passing the decision back to me.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: That too is fine.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Once I eliminate every last person involved in that incident years ago, there will be nothing more tying me to this place. I am beyond anxious to leave this forsaken land behind.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I need a fresh start.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: And who could blame me for seizing the opportunity if the shadows of the past so happen to be standing right there?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: What's your relationship with Dr. Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Hmm... It's a long story.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I owe her my life. I'm very thankful to her. This I say from the bottom of my heart.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: The decision isn't ours to make...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Three years ago... the Lord Ameer of Ibut perished in a fire during his travels. The fire consumed an entire town, and, soon after, his son set off a rebellion, vying for the throne against his many other contenders.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: That's your doing, eh?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Precisely, just as I said.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: All trivial matters of a bygone era. The family had a tragic, rocky relationship to start. I only played a very minor role.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Why do you want to know?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I'm looking for clues... Thanks to you, I gotta call it quits with my investigation in the Ibut region.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Ah... clues.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Perhaps this is an opportunity for me to earn your trust. Tell me what it is you are looking for. Perhaps I will be of assistance.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I'm looking for someone. The director of a Columbian military experiment.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: You are investigating a Columbian company. May I ask why?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Because the person I respected the most died in the most laughable accident ever...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: And what if it was actually an accident?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Even if it was just an accident... I gotta know the truth. I mean, this couldn't have been the reason those guys rose through the ranks on top of my brother's death.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Sesa...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I know. It's my own personal issue... but this chance doesn't come often. Don't you agree, 'Sand Soldier'?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Heh... Ahem, pardon me.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Where was I?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Everyone needs a revenge of some kind. Targets can be big or small, and grudges can run deep or shallow, but revenge is an eternal motif to every living person out there.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: If you permit me to undergo treatment at Rhodes Island, I can investigate this matter for you. Of course, the deals we talked about still stand.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Even if you have ten times the cargo sitting outside, I have a way to take care of it all. There will be no trace left of it, and you will find the price very attractive. It's a bargain for a pharmaceutical company.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Sesa... Sorry, but we can't let your personal problems be somebody else's bargaining chip.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Of course I know that... but I...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Right... I almost forgot. It seems I've been rather forgetful of late.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I never thought much of Old Isin's prophecy to begin with. However, thinking back, perhaps the prophecy was itself a means of negotiation and communication.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Hmph, prophecy... Mere mortals will never find themselves on equal footing with time itself. Originium Arts may have many convenient uses, but that is one thing you can never achieve with Arts.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: A prophecy...?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Alas, Old Isin passed away long ago. I only hope that she remembers this promise.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Did she perhaps... give you a gold coin?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: An old Sargon gold coin.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Heavyrain, Sesa, we got a situation here.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Calm down. What's up?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: There are some sketchy-looking teams approaching the town.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Let me remind you that they are not friendly.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Ugh, they're closing in quick. We can still get out of here without a fight if we make a run for it now. Take our time and we won't be so lucky.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Fifteen minutes. That's all we have. Captain, Lieutenant, hurry.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: â€”Your buddies?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Of course not. I am a lone wolf with no one to turn to. Unlike machines, humans cannot be trusted.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: That being said, they are most likely here for me.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: â€”Dammit! This is part of your plan, isn't it?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: You can help me escape, or we can fend off these unyielding assassins together.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: What do you say?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: W-What should we do?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The ball is in your court.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Tch, son of aâ€”
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: â€”Last question, then! Why did you burn down that town? If you were after the Lord Ameer, you had no reason to drag all those people into that mess.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: You even gave the townspeople the time to evacuate. Did you just want to ruin the town? Redhorn was miles away from your turf. What were you after exactly?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Is my objective really so important?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: â€”I'm making sure you're not a warmonger, or downright nuts.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Hmm, you have a point, but I am afraid you wouldn't understand. All I burned down was my past.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Is that your revenge?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: It was a long overdue cremation, nothing more.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'
